entry.title: Octopress 测试
entry.content:

测试测试

old blog

测试

再测试

结束

代码段测试

``` objc Objective-C Code http://snowfox.cnblogs.com/ start:100 mark:102,104-106

  • (void)controlClientPlaying:(int)identifier name:(NSString *)name length:(int)len position:(int)pos { dispatch_async(dispatch_get_main_queue(), ^{ playFilenameLabel.text = name; timelineSlider.maximumValue = len; timelineSlider.value = pos; timelineLenLabel.text = [self formatTimeInterval:len / 1000]; _timelinePosLabel.text = [self formatTimeInterval:pos / 1000];

          if ((_latestPlayingPosition == pos) && (self.playPSButton.tag != 0)) {
          self.playPSButton.tag = 0;
          [self changePPSButtonStatus:NO];
      }

      if ((_latestPlayingPosition != pos) && (self.playPSButton.tag != 1)) {
          self.playPSButton.tag = 1;
          [self changePPSButtonStatus:YES];
      }

      _latestPlayingPosition = pos;

      if (_currentPlayingIdentifier != identifier) {
          _currentPlayingIdentifier = identifier;

          int i = 0;

          for (TYPlayItem *pi in _client.playLists) {
              if (pi.identifier == identifier) {
                  BOOL founded = false;

                  for (NSIndexPath *index in self.tableView.indexPathsForVisibleRows) {
                      if (index.row == i) {
                          founded = true;
                          break;
                      }
                  }

                  if (!founded) {
                      [self.tableView setContentOffset:CGPointMake(0, i * self.tableView.rowHeight) animated:YES];
                  }

                  break;
              }

              i++;
          }

          [self.tableView reloadData];
      }
  });

    }

```
